songsTitle: a clock where the time is in a song title

songsMethod.value: Every minute, random songs are selected and played that contain the time in the title (e.g., 6:47 or 6:47 from Central Station).

All possible songs including times were queried using the Spotify API. Up to 10 were selected for each minute after sorting by a few factors (like popularity, likelihood of time reference, US market, etc.). Only three times have no results: 6:58, 9:07, and 9:49.
